response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. We are now offering this masterpiece to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a unique opportunity to own a piece that not only stands out but also represents a significant investment in quality and craftsmanship. We believe that with its exceptional features and unparalleled performance, it will bring immense satisfaction and utility to you. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
